segments.text: Who's that striking woman over there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hm ? Oh , that's Alice . She's totally mad . Don't get yourself in a room alone with her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Why not ? She looks great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know , but she's dangerous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'm not one to gossip , as you know , but rumor has it that she sued her former boss for sexual harassment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , this is just between ourselves , of course , but he was her lover and he wanted to leave her , so she got revenge . I heard him say she was a dangerous woman .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , while we're on the subject , what happened to you and your secretary ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no idea what you're talking about .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you excuse me a moment ? I have to make a phone call
segments.speaker: S1
